detail_desc: Sleeveless V-neck dress in a patterned weave with a frill around the armholes and a gathered yoke at the back. Gathers at the shoulders and an elasticated seam with a tie belt under the bust.
Trainers with lacing at the front and a wide, partly ribbed rubber trim around the soles. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Trainers with lacing at the front and a wide, partly ribbed rubber trim around the soles. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Trainers with lacing at the front and a wide, partly ribbed rubber trim around the soles. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Dungarees in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with crossover shoulder straps with an adjustable fastening at the front. Kangaroo pocket with sewn-on ears, elastication at the back, and ribbed hems. Partly lined.
Short, wide top in jersey with embroidered details, dropped shoulders and short, wide sleeves.
Knee-length flared skirt in a jacquard weave with a concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Flared skirt in a sturdy jacquard weave with a sheen, with an elasticated drawstring waist and pleats. Unlined.

Calf-length skirt in a stretch weave with a sewn-in wrapover and wide flounces at the front. Concealed zip at the back, a tie at the side and seam with a flounce at the front and hem. Overlocked edges. Unlined.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Joggers in printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, pockets at the top and ribbed hems.
Joggers in printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, pockets at the top and ribbed hems.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and back pocket. Legs with decorative stitching at the knees and ribbed hems.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and back pocket. Legs with decorative stitching at the knees and ribbed hems.

Double-breasted tuxedo jacket in woven fabric with satin notch lapels, covered buttons at the front, decorative covered buttons at the cuffs and a double back vent. Chest pocket and welt front pockets with a flap. Lined.
Oversized, padded jacket in woven fabric with a padded hood and concealed press-studs down the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and side pockets. Lined.
Oversized, padded jacket in woven fabric with a padded hood and concealed press-studs down the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and side pockets. Lined.
Oversized, padded jacket in woven fabric with a padded hood and concealed press-studs down the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and side pockets. Lined.
Oversized, padded jacket in woven fabric with a padded hood and concealed press-studs down the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and side pockets. Lined.
Cotton twill cap with embroidery on the front and ears on the top. Adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Poncho in an airy, patterned weave with a contrasting colour pompom trim down the sides.
Poncho in an airy, patterned weave with a contrasting colour pompom trim down the sides.
Dress in an airy, textured weave with short, gathered puff sleeves, an opening with a button at the back of the neck, smocking at the waist and lined skirt.
Bikini top with lined, lightly padded cups with removable inserts and ties at the back of the neck and front.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and double elasticated crossover straps front and back. High-cut at the back.
5-pocket jeans in hard-washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and slightly wider, tapered legs with raw-edge hems.
Straw hat with a fabric band around the brim. Lined. Width of brim 4 cm.
Straw hat with a fabric band around the brim. Lined. Width of brim 4 cm.
Hat in braided straw with a patterned fabric band and bow at the back. Lined. Width of brim 4.5 cm.
Shirt in a textured weave with a slight sheen. Collar, buttons at the top, and a wrapover with a tie at the front. High slits in the sides and wide, buttoned cuffs.

Padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Ribbed stand-up collar, zip with a decorative tab and press-studs down the front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Side pockets, a sleeve pocket with a zip and one inner pocket. Lined.
Straight-cut, short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a wide neckline, motif on the front and cut-out sections at the shoulders. Longer and rounded at the back.
Straight-cut, short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a wide neckline, motif on the front and cut-out sections at the shoulders. Longer and rounded at the back.
Straight-cut, short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a wide neckline, motif on the front and cut-out sections at the shoulders. Longer and rounded at the back.

Unicorn costume in soft velour with a sheen. Hood with embroidered details, appliqués and faux fur sections. Lightly padded wings on the back, a detachable tail, zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.

Dance dress in glossy jersey with a motif with reversible sequins at the top, long sleeves and crossover straps at the back. Glittery elasticated seam at the waist and a glittery skirt in two layers of tulle. Lined gusset.

Jersey dance dress with a print motif on the front, long sleeves and a detachable, patterned mesh cape. Glittery elasticated seam at the waist and a skirt in two layers of tulle, the top layer with a frill at the hem. Lined gusset.

Long-sleeved dance dress in glossy jersey with a velour front, a print motif and appliqué at the top, and concealed hook and loop fastening at the back. Glittery elastic seam at the waist, a detachable tail at the back and a glittery skirt in three layers of tulle. Lined gusset.
Faux fur scarf with satin on the back. Size 25x160 cm.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs with a zip at the hems.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs with a zip at the hems.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs with a zip at the hems.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs with a zip at the hems.
Fine-knit, fitted jumper in soft merino wool with a high collar.
Pyjamas with a shirt top and bottoms in soft cotton flannel. Shirt with an embroidery detail on the chest and buttons down the front. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.

Suit trousers in a textured wool weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button, and legs with creases. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Long-sleeved bodysuit in soft cotton jersey with a button at the top, chest pocket with a button and press-studs at the crotch.
5-pocket jeans in stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs.
Lightly padded fancy dress costume in the shape of a popcorn box with a hook and loop fastener at the top. Supplied with a lightly padded hat with a hook and loop fastener at the back.
Patterned swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Patterned swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Bath towel in soft, printed cotton terry with a hood. Cotton terry inside. Width 57.5 cm, length 66 cm.
Tube scarf in a soft, rib-knit wool blend. Width 34 cm, circumference 120 cm.
Tube scarf in a soft, rib-knit wool blend. Width 34 cm, circumference 120 cm.
Fully lined, printed swimsuit with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back.
Fully lined, printed swimsuit with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back.
Fully lined printed bikini. Top with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back, and a plastic fastener at the back.
Fully lined, printed swimsuit with narrow shoulder straps that join at the back.
Fully lined bikini. Top with a racer back and open section at the hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Bikini bottoms and a swim top in UV-protective fabric. Top with long raglan sleeves and a small stand-up collar. Fully lined bikini bottoms. UPF 50.
Fully lined, patterned bikini. Top with narrow, crossover shoulder straps and a plastic fastener at the back.

Set with a top and trousers in soft jersey. Top with a hood with a wrapover front and buttons at the top, a small patch pocket on one side and double-layered front section. Trousers with an elasticated waist, fake fly with decorative buttons and sewn-in turn ups at the hems. The cotton content of the garments is organic.

Soft, non-wired bralette in microfibre and lace with unlined cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Wide lace frill at the front, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and no fasteners.

Soft, non-wired lace bra that gives the bust a natural shape and light support. Lined front with a frill at the top and along the narrow shoulder straps. Fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Velour body with a wide flounce at the top and detachable, adjustable shoulder straps. Lined crotch with press-studs.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey with a chest pocket and ribbed cuffs.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a soft cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and ribbed hems.
